short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT,DOCS MAY BE SUBMITTED IN EITHER OFFICIAL LANGUAGE
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence (DND), through the Canadian Forces Health Services Group (CF H Svcs Gp), has a requirement for the professional services of one (1) Emergency Medical Physician to provide expert advice and support on the management of patients to the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) Physicians, Physician Assistants, Medical Technicians and other Health Care providers at sea and on land in remote locations around the world.",
full_summary:
# Emergency Medical Advisory Services

## Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the provision of emergency medical advisory services to the Canadian Armed Forces. The successful supplier will provide expert advice and support to military personnel operating in remote locations worldwide.

### Contract Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01021151
* **Publication Date**: January 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 24, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Contract Period**: June 1, 2023 to March 31, 2026, with a three-year option for extension
* **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

### Service Requirements

The successful supplier must provide the following services:

* Expert medical advice and support to military personnel operating in remote locations worldwide
* Management of patients by CAF physicians, physician assistants, and other healthcare providers

### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available in both English and French and can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/12/9b3f9e2dbf5074b29cf98d5dc2d6dd1f/w6369-23-a075_-_rfp_-_english.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/12/dcf8f47596f182b665cf225d3e5ec96c/w6369-23-a075_-_rfp_-_fr.pdf

### Additional Information

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* No security requirements are associated with this contract

### Contact Information

* Natalie Provost, Procurement Specialist
* Email: natalie.provost@forces.gc.ca
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* Phone: None
* Fax: None
